node.address: Calle del Comercio 2, Capurgana , Capurgana, Colombia

content.value:
The inn has been designed and built by the Italian owner who left his profession of architecture and the lifestyle of the big cities, he has been devoted to realize his dream of building a small guesthouse using traditional construction methods and local materials.

Posada del Gecko is a small budget hostel in Capurgana center with 4 rooms with private bathrooms and 3 cabins that overlook the internal garden.

Posada del Gecko is a small budget hostel in the center of Capurgana with a private indoor garden where guests can gather in a welcoming environment Edor and nice.
It has been built by Alberto, an Italian architect who owns the property, following the traditional uses of construction and the use of local materials.
Keep in mind that Capurgana NO ATM is available, so make sure you have money available for your stay.

Posada del Gecko is a small budget hostel in Capurgana center with an internal private garden where hosts can gather in a cozy and friendly environment.
It has been built by Alberto, an italian architect who own the property, following traditional construction uses and using local materials.
Beware that in Capurgana NO ATM are available so make sure you have cash available for your stay.

description.description: Posada del Gecko is a small hostel with a informal atmosphere. It is located in the center of Capurganá and is built around a private garden where guests can meet in a relaxing, warm, friendly atmosphere and enjoy the Italian restaurant and bar service.
